reviewText: Is an exceptional anime for the type of anime that we all know that we are getting this for it would be more perfect if they had a English edition yeah English dub for all you Noobs !!! Still Alice Awesome by and a great hentai with a very fun and interesting storyline !!! Very very interesting plot twist I'm just saying that they never made a sequel to it so we could see if they ask to start to answer some of the questions made for in the original !!! Will they be ever be actual Justice for the characters that make up the team will they ever get revenge on the horrible people responsible for then winding up in the current state there and which led them to the abilities allow them to be part of the team hopefully the people responsible for it will make a follow-up a sequel so these questions can be answered oh well have fun !!!
I didn't like it period I have nightmares for a month!!!!!
It's a classic and great for hentai fans!

I've seen parts of this movie online. And for anyone who likes every thing adult and anime, likes a plot with their movie, blood, action and demon fighting, then this movie is just right. I like the main character of this movie, he's supposed to be the good guy, but can't fight (or do anything in bed) until he smells blood. For instance; One chic in bed with him tried getting him aroused by cutting herself, but because she wasn't human she couldn't bleed. So not much happened that time.
Can't give a solid review as to what it's really like since I've only seen bits and pieces.

demon warrior koji is about a half human half demon who is a part of a unique police unit that does cases in supernatural sex crimes of something like that. his assignment was to find out who or what was killing these random people(the majority of them are men). all of this is connected to a woman who is a staight up nymphomaniac who randomly has sex with different and stange men anywhere and everywhere, but most of her sexual partners ends up dead and it all
leads up to her son who dosen't like when those men do that stuff to her. every since the boy's father treated his mother like garbage, he dosen't want any man near his mother and at the end of the movie, it was shown that the boy turned into a demon killed those men who did his mother wrong so he wanted revenge. the english dubbing was ok but i think it should have been better. the fight scenes were bloody and artistic which makes it a good action/hentai. the sex scenes are extremely explict so this hentai anime is NOT FOR KIDS!! I believe you will probably like this anime if you're not squeamish.

i really liked this anime, but i do hope the make some sequels to it.
the anime was really good, you can really tell the diference between the new age anime and the anime in late 1980's.

sex, violence, crime solving, and mystery want more could you ask for

i would recommend this anime to anyone that likes anime and place this one in their collection.
